title: Language Learning Design Workshop Through Future Prediction Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced language proficiency and experience utilizing digital learning tools
context.additional_context: A collaborative course focused on designing learner-driven, future-scenario-based language learning experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively develop three scenarios for future language learning environment changes within three months.
Learners create prototypes of language learning tools at least twice using speculative design techniques.
Learners can improve their learning design plans by at least 80% based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
